title: Contact Us
content: If you need to contact an in-game admin or discord moderator, contact us via the method below.

title: Open Ticket
content: Please choose an appropriate category from the select menu below to open a ticket. If you are unsure of which category to choose, please select 'Other'.

options.label: Claim Raid Insurance
options.description: If you have been raided, you can claim raid insurance here.

options.label: Report a Player
options.description: If you need to report a player, you can do so here.

options.label: VIP Questions
options.description: If you want to enquire about VIP, you can do so here.

options.label: Other
options.description: If you are unsure of which category to choose, please select this.
